24.title: Episode #1.24
24.plot: Marina tells Arsenije about DNA test results. However, he is so in love with Dragana that he isn't interested in anything other than the possibility of being with her. Kristina flirts to make Nikola jealous, but he is preoccupied with Arsa and his love hurts, which will result in being taken to the police. Rade seeks from Vanja advice how to propose Tanja and hires her to work for him. Dana slept on the low branches because she began to steal from her own daughter. Marina tries to find a way to tell Pavle about the results of the test, but is aware that Tanja plays ...

25.title: Episode #1.25
25.plot: Dana slept on the low branches because she began to steal from her own daughter. Dana finally acknowledges that she is a dice addict. Joca and Tanja conflicts about Tara. Sofija is torn apart between break up with Kiza and help for mother to save her job. Rade is trying to get Nikola to work for him and offers him a job of consultant, which gets Pavle jealous.

26.title: Episode #1.26
26.plot: Marina and Nikola got attacked in a park by Tasa, but they managed to escape. Tasa, later, called Kris on a radio and threatened to her and Sloba. Kiza came to Arsa for advice because Sofija broke up with him. Pavle slept with Tanja. Joca decided to investigate their "relationship". Tara goes angry on her mother because of her salary.

27.title: Episode #1.27
27.plot: Rade organizes a celebration in his firm regarding his "Kebab for dogs", but, then, the problem begins - Arsa tells him the recipe is in fact Nikola's, so Rade sends Pavle at Nikola's place to ask him to sing a treaty that gives them a recipe, but Nikola refuses, but, later, he comes in firm and Rade offers him a job of consultant, which got Pavle jealous. Arsa reveals Tara he is her nephew, and Sofija calls Arsa and tells him she and Kiza reconciled. Meantime, Joca openly threat Tanja.

28.title: Episode #1.28
28.plot: Tasa comes at Kris' radio and starts to bully her, so, she call for help sending secret message in a form of song dedicated to Nikola and Sloba - Pomagajte drugovi. Sloba immediately got it and alarmed Nikola and Nikola went to Kris. Arsa got advice from Nikola how to save Sofija from Kiza, so he went in cafe to meet with her and Kiza and brought Tara with him. Marina thinks Pavle is cheating on her, so she starts and investigation with Vanja and finds out she's right. Joca tells Marina her father wants to marry Tanja and, later, presses Tanja even stronger. Rade ...

29.title: Episode #1.29
29.plot: Nikola ran's into Kris' apartment and saves her from Tasa. Marina forced Pavle to admit what he did and, after he admitted it, she threw him out of the house. After the conversation with Nikola about Pavle's affair, Marina told Nikola she wants a divorce. Rade met Nikola in the park with Marina and again offered him a job. Tanja gave Pavle an ultimatum and threatened him very brutally.

30.title: Episode #1.30
30.plot: Sofija ran from home and Arsa took hide her in his room, which made a little misunderstanding when Marina saw her in bathroom hiding behind the door and thought Pavle slept with her too, but Arsa explained all. In school, Sofija's mom, Goga, talked with Arsa about Sofija and he told her he don't know where she is and then Nikola came and Arsa introduced him as his father, which made Goga confused later when Pavle opened her and introduced himself as Arsa's father. Rade proposes Tanja and Joca warns Marina about that.

31.title: Episode #1.31
31.plot: Rade and Marina came to Tanja's place to talk and Pavle, half-naked, barely had a time to get dress and hide. Goga talked with Sofija and with Arsa and Marina and Vanja and Sofija returned to school. During a dog walk, Marina saw Nikola kissing with Goga.

32.title: Episode #1.32
32.plot: Vanja and Marina spoke about Nikola's kissing with Goga and Vanja presents the fact that Nikola is maybe Sofija's biological father too. Rade once again talked with Nikola about his offer. Dana and Ilija are dividing things in the flat and preparing for the divorce. Arsa got in a fight with Kiza in school because of Sofija, but he got lucky because Dzeri was with him.

33.title: Episode #1.33
33.plot: Sofija and Arsa ran from home and Marina, Pavle, Nikola and Goga are looking for them. Nikola asks Kris to help and she sends a coded message via radio and finds out Arsa and Sofija are at Sloba's place. Vanja borrowed Tanja's place for an emergency "seasnce", but, when Tanja left for work, she started to snoops around and finds something socking in Tanja's place. Episode ends with Tanja ambush Pavle with knife in his bedroom.

34.title: Episode #1.34
34.plot: Pavle explained to Tanja why Goga answered on his phone and Tanja then beg him to forgive her and wanted to make love with Pavle in his bed, but Pavle managed to take her out of the house. Arsa tells Sofija his biological father is Nikola. Rade announces he is marrying Tanja and because of that, Arsa served a blackmail to Pavle for a breakfast. Vanja reveals to Marina what she found at Tanja's place.

35.title: Episode #1.35
35.plot: Kiza tries to get back Sofija, but failed while Ilija gives an advertisement in the papers for a female worker. Arsa tells Nikola and Marin he will tell Pavle the truth. Pavle reveals Tanja he is blackmailed by Arsa, but it's backfires him. Tanja takes Vanja to be her bridesmaid.

36.title: Episode #1.36
36.plot: Tanja calls Pavle on cellphone and her talking over the phone is extremely disturbed. Marina decides to tell Pavle the truth about Arsa, but, after a talking with Nikola over the phone, Arsa decides it isn't time yet. After the test, Ilija introduces Goga to the job, but Dana is trying to sabotage her in all ways.

37.title: Episode #1.37
37.plot: Sofija asks a pause from Arsa - she needs to be alone a little. Nesa returns from Morocco and, after Marina told him about her father and Tanja, he immediately recruits Joca to work undercover for him and find everything he can about Tanja. Pavle calls his brother Stefan to come. Nikola is guest at Kris' radio and dedicates a song to Marina, but, unknown to him, Goga calls the radio and flirts with him and because of that, Marina got angry on him. Later, Nikola came at Marina's place and told her he knows she still loves him.

38.title: Episode #1.38
38.plot: Joca cunningly asks Tanja for information about her family to "sent them invitation cards" for wedding. Pavle welcomes his brother, lawyer Stefan, to help him and Tanja to steal a firm from Rade. Pavle surprised when he saw Nesa coming out from his bathroom just when he finished showering. Nikola, Marina, Nesa and Vanja went out in club, but Nikola and Marina went from there drunk. Dana suspect Ilija is cheating on her.

39.title: Episode #1.39
39.plot: Vaske informs Arsa he saw Sofija on a coffee with Kiza. Rade informs Tanja Joca wants her passport, but Tanja gives her passport to Rade instead and she gave Rade an ultimatum - or he will fire Joca, or she is leaving him. Arsa came at Nikola's place, found Marina and him sleeping together and ran out. Dana caught Ilija trying to kiss Goga. Stefan meets with Rade at firm, where he meets Tanja, and Rade offers him a job in a legal department.

40.title: Episode #1.40
40.plot: Nesa found out from Joca about the clinic Tanja went at and told that Marin and Vanja. Marina found out Joca was fired and spoke with her father about it and she got the idea how to found a little bit more about Tanja. Meantime, Marina told Arsa he saw all wrong when he saw her and Nikola, but Arsa came out with Pavle from the toilet and Marina and Arsa told Pavle Arsa saw her speaking with Tanja. Goga told by accident Dana about her grandson, but she managed to pull out. Arsa holds Sofija on stand by.

41.title: Episode #1.41
41.plot: Marina managed to convince Tanja to give back Joca and Nesa their old jobs. Tanja tries the wedding dresses with Marina's and Vanja's help. Sofija informs Arsa she and her mother are moving to Nis. Stefan flirts parallel with Tara and Kris.

42.title: Episode #1.42
42.plot: Arsa slept over at Sofija's place. The morning after, Goga calls Pavle and informs him Arsa has a temperature, so Pavle and Marina went to her, but they caught her kissing Nikola. Sloba found himself in an unblemished grape when he met with Kris' lawyer and realized it lawyer isn't he's family's lawyer.

43.title: Episode #1.43
43.plot: Joca and Nesa set up another "present" for Tanja and called Marina and Vanja to see her reaction. Rade found CD by Dr. Ripstajn by accident and saw Tanja face on it. Nikola got drunk because Marina saw Goga kissing him and he ended up in Arsa's bed where he slept.

44.title: Episode #1.44
44.plot: After negotiation with Ilija and Dana, Sloba sends them son of one of Danilo's friends and instructed him to represent himself as Nikola's son. Vanja informs Marina the clinic where the DNA test had been done is closed and the doctor was arrested, and because of that, the DNA test maybe is wrong.

45.title: Episode #1.45
45.plot: Nikola has difficulties with a young man Sloba "infiltrated" as his son, and then, Marina makes even bigger difficulties when she tells him about the DNA test and the clinic. Rade managed to reconcile with Tanja and they married and informed his family when they finished it. Sloba's family lawyer shows up at Kris' door, so Stefan was forced to explain to her who he really is.

46.title: Episode #1.46
46.plot: After a brief incident in which Vasa accidentally reveal himself as not being Dana's and Ilija's grandson, they realize Sloba fooled them. Rade tells his colleagues in firm he married Tanja and Joca fell unconscious.

47.title: Episode #1.47
47.plot: Rade organizes a wedding celebration and calls Nikola and his family on it, but Nikola is asked by Marina not to come and he already didn't wanted to come. On the celebration, Rade got a heart attack and he felt his life is over so his last wish was to Nikola and Arsa took over his firm.

48.title: Episode #1.48
48.plot: Rade was hospitalized, but he insisted to be at home, so he was transferred at Marina's house where his condition stabilized. Meantime, Vanja announces to Marina she is going to have a baby with Nesa.

49.title: Episode #1.49
49.plot: Tanja is preparing to take over the firm, but it is not going as well as she planned. Marina, Pavle and her are informed by Ceca that Rade is missing, but they calmed down when Nikola returned him at Marina's house. Meantime, Nesa canceled the baby-making with Vanja because she told Marina about it and Marina told Pavle, and Arsa's and Sofija's relationship got strained.

50.title: Episode #1.50
50.plot: Rade is still in house and can't go anywhere. Arse doubts in Sofija's relationship with Kiza and Vaske helps him in "spying" them. Tajna's and Pavle's relationship comes to a stumbling block because she wants him to divorce Marina and he wants her to divorce Rade. Nikola's and Marina's relationship starts to change.

51.title: Episode #1.51
51.plot: Rade got a visit - Dana and Ilija. Nesa meets with a former professor of music education, Marta, from high school who taught the class where were Pavle, him, Marina, Nikola, Vanja, Kris and Sloba. Later, professor Marta met with someone she helped in the past.

52.title: Episode #1.52
52.plot: Nesa brought retired professor Marta at Marina's and Pavle's house and he, Vanja, Pavle, Nikola and Marina sang a song. Rade buys a place for him and Tanja and they move there. Kris managed to find Sofija job at one cafe, but Arsa is a little bit jealous where he saw Sofija taking drink for two guests.

53.title: Episode #1.53
53.plot: Rade returns on job. In schoolyard, fight starts between Kiza, Vaske, Arsa and Buki. Later in toilet, Kiza orders Vaske to informs him what happens between Arsa and Sofija. Nesa resigns on his position at Rade's firm. Tanja tries to force him to stay, but fails. Marina openly tells Pavle she wants a divorce.

54.title: Episode #1.54
54.plot: Vanja suggest Marina to go to spa and Marina accepts the suggestion, but one small accident turns her going to a search for a missing person. The situation is solved after Marina and Vanja return from the spa. Rade decides to send Tanja to talk with Nikola and to try to persuade him to join his firm.

55.title: Episode #1.55
55.plot: Tanja comes at Nikola's place and talk with him by Rade's instructions. Sloba asks Vanja to go on a date and she accepts, so Sloba starts to change his life. Tara finds out who was Stefan's other girlfriend.

56.title: Episode #1.56
56.plot: Arsa tells Rade he found a job in Tigar's cafe and Rade got furious. Marta visited Rade and Tanja was forced to pay her again for her silence. Pavle comforted Marina with his knowledge about her's and Nikola's meeting in park.

57.title: Episode #1.57
57.plot: Marta again visited Rade in firm. Later, she redemanded money from Tanja. Tigar found out Arsa is talented for singing and he ordered him to find 25 songs and perform in his cafe. Marina, Nikola and Arsa retested DNA.

58.title: Episode #1.58
58.plot: Marta calls Marina and she asks for a meeting with her and Marina accepts this. Arsa is preparing for his first performance in cafe and the news about this spreads through school. Later, Marina calls Marta to ask her why she didn't come on their meeting, but Marta's niece answers and tells her Marta had a car accident.

59.title: Episode #1.59
59.plot: Tanja reveals to Pavle who took the photos of Nikola and Marina. Later, she planted a worm of suspicion in Rade's brain about Marina's cheating on Pavle. Arsa performed in Tigar's cafe and he got a kiss on cheek from Ana and she asked him for his phone number which gave a little jealousy to Sofija.

60.title: Episode #1.60
60.plot: Accidently, Kris finds out Sofija called Stefan which starts a big series of events in about is Stefan flirting with Sofija or not. Arsa and Sofija reveal they reconciled and because of that Ana's and Sofija's relationship got strained. Kris reveals to Nikola who is spying on him and Marina, but, she they doesn't know for who that person is spying. Dana comes in Rade's firm with a business proposition.

61.title: Episode #1.61
61.plot: Aftera a misunderstanding with Sloba, Arsa gets mad and argues with Sofija because he thinks she cheats on him with his uncle Stefan. Later, Marina and Nikola are ambushed in Kris' car by the policeman who tells them to go in police station, but the situation ends when Dejan, the policeman, recognize Nikola. Rade talks with Tanja about Pavle.

62.title: Episode #1.62
62.plot: Ilija finds out the real reason of Novica's arriving in the city and Nikola and Novica had an unusual meeting with Montenegrin brothers in the park and because of that Nikola lost Marina's dog Eva. Arsa and Sofija break up. Marina comes in the firm to tell Rade she is divorcing Pavle, but she overheard the conversation between Rade and Tanja and found out a shocking news. Kris' friend, Dejan, conflicted with Stefan and Stefan got arrested.

63.title: Episode #1.63
63.plot: Stefan reveals to Joca Rade wants a baby with Tatjana and, because of that, Joca calls a clinic to ask about sperm function of an older men. Vaske tells Sofija to reconcile with Arsa, so she goes to his house, but enters in his room in the moment Ana kissed him. The Montenegrin brothers came at Nikola's place looking for Novica.

64.title: Episode #1.64
64.plot: Stefan demands from Marina to convince Rade to return him on job. Sofija caught Ana kissing Arsa and left from there under the wrong though he was kissing her. Pavle return home very sick. Meantime, Kris succeed to convince the Montenegrin brothers to let Novica go.

65.title: Episode #1.65
65.plot: Pavle's sickness got worse - he now has a fever. Marina reconciled with Tanja and convinced Rade to return Stefan on job and that the divorce doesn't affect on Pavle's position in the firm. Sofija told Vaske what happened at Arsa's place and he will no longer hear about Arsa because he likes Ana. Vaske told Kiza about Ana's and Arsa's kissing. Later, Arsa tried to reconcile with Sofija, but failed.

66.title: Episode #1.66
66.plot: Pavle is a bit better, but he is still in bed because he has a temperature. Marina, Nikola and Arsa are still waiting results of a new DNA test they did. Vaske visits Arsa and their reconcile and Vaske tells him he is no longer in love with Ana, because he now fall in love with Ceca, the maid of Filipovic's. Later, Tanja gave Tara the keys of the firm so that she could stay with Stefan alone.

67.title: Episode #1.67
67.plot: Pavle healed and returned in the firm. Tanja fixed Rade to caught Tara and Stefan in his office and Tara was forced to tell them she is pregnant and that Nikola is going to marry her. Ilija and Dana's godson Novica is leaving. The new DNA test are finished, but there was an accident - Nikola forgot them in his room and Dana found them.

68.title: Episode #1.68
68.plot: Stefan reconciled with Kris and told her the truth about his relationship with Tara. Later, he got in conflict with Tanja and she punched him in his balls and Tara saw it. Arsa finally reconciled with Sofija. Kiza told Buki he asked Ana to go with him out just to make Sofija jealous, but he didn't know Sofija reconciled with Arsa in the meantime.

69.title: Episode #1.69
69.plot: Stefan admits to Pavle what Tanja did to him and Pavle conflicted with her. Vanja met with her former boyfriend Zaharije at her office. Marina speaks with Vanja about should she tell Pavle about the DNA test. Stefan told Dana and Ilija he doesn't want to marry.

70.title: Episode #1.70
70.plot: Tanja and Pavle reconciled and continued their secret affair. Vaske went at Arsa's place and talked with Ceca and managed to convince her to go out with him. Rade becomes suspicious about Tanja and Joca helped him to break in her drawer, but the attempt failed because Tanja caught them. Because of that, she left Rade's house and returned in her flat. Marina admitted to Nesa who is Arsa's biological father.

71.title: Episode #1.71
71.plot: Tanja's and Rade's relationship is more and more strained and Rade thinks, under the influence of Joca's allegations, Stefan is Tanja's lover. Arsa spoke with Dzeri about his family problems and Kiza overheard their conversation. Vaske called Ceca and asked her to go out with him and she agreed. Stefan and Kris are now in serious relationship.

72.title: Episode #1.72
72.plot: In the aftermath of Kiza's overheard of Arsa's and Dzeri's conversation, Kiza provoked Arsa and the two fought and Arsa got spelled out of the school. Ilija overheard Nikola's and Tara's argue and found out Arsa is his grandson, Vanja slept with Zaharije in her office and Stefan sabotaged Tanja's trip to Novi Sad by sending Rade to meet with her instead of Pavle. Nikola, Kris and Sloba watched the old movie they made in which is the oath their made about 20 years ago.

73.title: Episode #1.73
73.plot: Rade wants Stefan's opinion about is Tanja truthfully to Rade. Problem with Arsa will maybe be solved because Tanja suggest one her friend to teach Arsa economy. Arsa and Ilija spoke for the first time as grandson and grandpa. Dana overheard part of Ilija's conversation with Arsa and she wrongly thinks Ilija has a lover.

74.title: Episode #1.74
74.plot: Tanja and Rade found Arsa a teacher of economy - Viktorija who is Tanja's friend. When Viktorija and Arsa finished their first class, Ceca feels that something is going on between the two. Joca resigns from Rade's firm and the resignation is irrevocable. Danilo and Sloba talk about Kris' relationship with Stefan and both of them have different opinion. Zaharije thanks Vanja for being a good woman and he promises her he won't be back in her life again.

75.title: Episode #1.75
75.plot: Stefan managed to convince Joca to return to the firm. Arsa told Nikola he wants to go to San Francisco to study and Nikola tells him not to go from the wrong reasons. Marina realized Nikola was always there for her when she needed help and she went at Nikola's place where Ilija told her he knows the truth about Arsa.

76.title: Episode #1.76
76.plot: Rade suggests he and Tanja go on a dinner with Stefan and his girlfriend, who is unknown to him Kris. Arsa talks with Nikola and Ilija about his traveling to USA. After Vanja and Nesa told her they are going to have a baby, Marina strongly decides to tell Pavle that he isn't Arsa's father, but, unknown to her, Pavle found the DNA results from the clinic.

77.title: Episode #1.77
77.plot: In the aftermath of finding the DNA test, Pavle has a felling like his entire world collapsed. Stefan tried to calm him down by going with him in cafe, but Pavle went gone while Stefan talked with Kris via mobile phone. Arsa tells Ilija and Nikola he is going in USA and Nikola told him not to go from the wrong reasons. Sofija came at Arsa's to talk with him, but Arsa didn't want to talk with her. Jovan overheard Tanja gifted her car to Tara.

78.title: Episode #1.78
78.plot: Sofija tried to talk to Arsa, but she left from his home when Viktorija came. Stefan managed to convince Pavle to behave as nothing happen and to wait for Marina to tell him about Arsa herself. Jovan told Arde about Tanja's gift to Tara. Dana returned with completely new look that nobody can accept.

79.title: Episode #1.79
79.plot: Vaske comes at Arsa's place and gives Ceca a present and see there Viktorija, Arsa's teacher, and recognizes her as a stripper in the club he works at. Dana thinks Marina is Nikola's girlfriend.

80.title: Episode #1.80
80.plot: Dana and Ilija visited Rade at his firm to talk about Tanja's present to Tara and, while being there, Tanja made a little incident in front of them. Meantime, Pavle behavior is more and more strange - he wanted to hit and run Nikola, but in the last moment, he turn the car. Vaske and Dzeri told Nikola about their suspicion about Viktorija's true nature.

81.title: Episode #1.81
81.plot: Marina becomes worried about Pavle's behavior and talks with Vanja and Nesa about it. Also, Vanja caught Nesa and dr. Filip Stamatovic, their doctor about making babies, in cafe. Nikola and Sloba unmasked Viktorija and Rade had a small accident in Ilija's shop. Later, Rade sends Stefan to get close to Viktorija and finds out is she the real professor. When she saw Viktorija and Stefan leaving the firm, Tara misunderstood their going out and told Kris by the phone their went on a date. Kris caught them in cafe.

82.title: Episode #1.82
82.plot: After the fight between Nikola and Pavle at the firm, Marina finally success to tell Pavle he isn't Arsa's father. Pavle feels heartbroken. Nesa suggest Vanja to find a new doctor for them, but Vanja changes her mind and decides to let Nesa date dr. Filip and that dr. Filip continue to be their doctor.

83.title: Episode #1.83
83.plot: Stefan still instructs Pavle how to behave about Marina and, later, Stefan finds out who told Kris about his meeting with Viktorija in cafe. Viktorija admitted Arsa what her real job is and he told her he already new about it. Pavle asked Rade for an administrative leave and, despite Tanja's opposition, Rade gave him leave.

84.title: Episode #1.84
84.plot: Arsa met with Sofija and Dzeri in school and Sofija explained she managed to convince the school board the fight is Kiza's fault and their asked Arsa to return to school. Stefan again met with VIktorija and talk with her about Tanja's past. Nikola is broken after Marina told him there is no "Them" in her life.

85.title: Episode #1.85
85.plot: Arsa is now officially back in the school, but Vaske has a problem - he will be expelled from the school because of a large number of absences. There was a little incident in the school - Pavle and Nikola had a small fight, but Arsa managed to separate them. Filip explains Nesa why he can't live with him and who his daughter is.

86.title: Episode #1.86
86.plot: Pavle, Marina and Arsa set down with Nikola to talk about situation with Arsa and, after some little conflicts between Pavle and Nikola, they agreed to keep the truth about who the real Arsa's father is from their families until they find a solution. Neibor Zika came at Ilija and Dana and meet with Tara. He likes Tara, but Tara doesn't like him and Dana matchmakes. Arsa decided to live with Nikola.

87.title: Episode #1.87
87.plot: When Arsa decides to continue living with Isidorovic family, angry Pavle is coming to Isidorovic's house. As she runs the radio show, Kris will receive a phone call where Stefan announces his visit. Ilija and Dana are waiting for the epilogue of Pavle's visit.

88.title: Episode #1.88
88.plot: Pavle wants that he and Marina have a baby. Vanja talks with Nikola about Marina. Zika helps Dana to start a blog. Kris doesn't know how to get rid of Stefan, so she hires Danilo to play her boyfriend, Australian shipowner Simon. Tanja spends afternoon having sex with Pavle. She lied Rade that she's going to a physiotherapist. Rade is mad at Tanja after he realizes that she wasn't at physiotherapist's. Tara has a car accident and her car crashed. Zika promised that he'll hack the insurance company's website, so it'll look like Tara's car has insurance.

89.title: Episode #1.89
89.plot: Stefan tried to reconcile with Kris, but she didn't want that and hit him in the head with a guitar. Rade and Tanja have a dinner with Marina and Pavle and Pavle explains his plans for their future. It looks like Ceca broke up with Vaske.

90.title: Episode #1.90
90.plot: At dinner in Filipovic's home Marina admits to Rade that she doesn't want a second child with Pavle, and Rade admits to her that he doubts that Tatjana is cheating on him and that it's someone from work. Tatjana is jealous and she tells Pavle that if he makes a child to Marina, she will have to make a child her too. Because of Tatiana, there is a fight between Stefan and Pavle. Arsenije rolled out when he called Ilija 'grandpa' in front of Dana, so Nikola and Arsenije told her the truth. Marina accuses Stefan that he's Tanja's lover.

91.title: Episode #1.91
91.plot: In Rade's firm, the system drop down, and the situation is, of course, drawn by Zika, which in the name of gratitude gets an excellent business offer. Nebojsa is sad because his dear is going to London, but he is surprised with Filip's request to take care of Ana. Nikola and Ilija come for Dana, but nobody knows that furious Pavle will appear in the flat. Stefan proposes Tatjana an indecent offer, and she accepts without a conversation.

92.title: Episode #1.92
92.plot: Marina asks Kris about Stefan's cheating on her and with whom it was. Nikola and Sloba went out in some clubs. There was a brief incident after Marina accidentally told Rade Arsa is going to his grandparents on a dinner.

93.title: Episode #1.93
93.plot: Under the pretext that he encountered a huge woman on the street who associated him on a schoolmate, Stefan gets the information he asked for - her name is Anastasia Bencic. Kristina confesses to Nikola and Sloba she spoke with Marin and told her Nikola and Sloba had gone to their detriment. Stefan goes to Tanja's office and makes her aware she is caught. At dinner at Isidorovic's place, Arsa arrives, but with a surprise.

94.title: Episode #1.94
94.plot: Pavle is preparing a surprise in the form of traveling, but Marina doesn't rejoice, because she realizes Pavle is pressuring her over every extent. She is again torn apart, but still doesn't give up trying to save their marriage. Tanja makes a scene to Pavle because his traveling to Venice. Rade is questioning Vanja about Tanja, and Nikola is very badly after receiving news about Marina's traveling with Pavle. Stefan openly confronts Tanja with a reminder of Antastasija. which will force her to show full range of her aggressiveness.

95.title: Episode #1.95
95.plot: Zika impose himself on Tara and has an ally in Dana. Tanja feels worse and wants to stay alone, which rattles Rade hard. Eva is ill and Nikola comes to help. Pavle brutally and aggressively attacks Vanja, accusing her of destroying his marriage. At the vet's, Nikola meets Sandra, with whom he had an adventure as a high school student. Vaska comes to Ceca at the right time.

96.title: Episode #1.96
96.plot: Eva is successfully operated, but Sandra is awakening different emotions with her former schoolmates. Nesa tells Vanji a secret that links him and Sandra, and she and Marina feel uncomfortable and little jealous. Zika seeks from Dana advice on how to conquer Tara, which she welcomes with joy. Tanja isn't ready to share joyful news with Rade, but Pavle also sees the nervousness of the future. He begins to apprehend Tanja's reactions and plans, because he realizes she doesn't stray from anything.

97.title: Episode #1.97
97.plot: Tanja won't be afraid to put Pavle's child as Rade's, but Rade doesn't feel anything. Ana arrives at Arsa's place, where Sofija sees her and becomes jealous of the newly-established closeness of Arsa and Ana. Marina's instinct says something about Tanja's pregnancy is wrong.

98.title: Episode #1.98
98.plot: Sandra comes to visit Nikola, where the curious Dana and Ilija welcome her. She wants to restore beautiful memories of youth and chemistry between Nikola and herself. Marina's instinct says something about Tanja's pregnancy is wrong. Sloba sees Stefan at Kristina's place and confronts him. Dana realizes she has to talk to Marina. Rade and Tanja are arguing about her lifestyle what he doesn't approve of because he thinks she doesn't care about the child she is carrying. Nikola meets Janko, Sandra's former business and emotional partner, with whom she has unhealthy ...

99.title: Episode #1.99
99.plot: Arsa openly faces Pavle with the question paternity, while Marina's jealousy on Sandra is growing. After the night they spend together again, Kristina and Stefan can't be separated, and he admits to her he is in love with her.

100.title: Episode #1.100
100.plot: Rade dobija pismo od Tanje. To ce ga izbezumiti jer se plasi da ce da je izgubi. Umesto sa Nesom, Vanja na premijeru vodi Marinu, a Pavle im se privaljuje u poslednji cas. Na Nikolinim vratima pojavljuje se neodekivan posetilac koji ce mu izneti veoma zanimljive podatke o Sandri. U sred noci, Marini u kucu dolazi Rade koji je potpuno izbezumljen zbog toga sto ne zna sta da radi sa svojom zenom. Vest da se Nikola zeni potresce Marinu. Arsa smislja opaki plan - on zna kako da raskrinka Tanju i Pavla i zato sa Anom odlazi kod Stefana.

101.title: Episode #1.101
101.plot: Arsa, Sloba i Ana saopstavaju Kris da su kod Stefana u stanu zatekli Tanju. Nikola dolazi sa Sandrom kod Radeta kako bi se dogovorili oko pokroviteljstva. Marina se protivi brzopletoj odluci svog oca, ali ne iz poslovnih, vec iz licnih razloga. Kada ugleda Anu i Arsu kako se ljube, Sofija potpuno poludi.

102.title: Episode #1.102
102.plot: Na najprepredeniji moguci nacin Tanja ponovo ucenjuje Taru. Sva izbezumljena, Ana odlazi kod Nebojse i prica mu da je uradila nesto lose, ali da joj se ipak svidelo. Sandrin bivsi muva Marinu, a ona i ne sluti sta se krije u pozadini.

103.title: Episode #1.103
103.plot: Kada Filipova bivsa supruga dodje u posetu Ani, Nesa, Vanja i Arsa glume srecnu, obicnu porodicu, ali spetljanost iz minuta u minut postaje sve veca i neprijatnija, pogotovo kada zazvoni telefon. Zbog teskoca u koji je zapao, Stefan pomaze Slobi i izmedju njih dvojice pocinju da se radjaju prijateljski odnosi. Kada Ilija dodje u posetu Radetu, izmedju njih dvojice izbija velika svadja.

104.title: Episode #1.104
104.plot: Nikola zatice Sandru u Jankovom zagrljaju i shvata da ga ona i dalje voli. Nakon Tanjine dojave, Rade besan kao ris dolazi u Ilijinu radnju gde zatice Arsu.

105.title: Episode #1.105
105.plot: Tatjana se opasno igra sa Pavlovim zivcima, ali i tajnom koju je otkrila. Filipova bivsa se na kaucu poverava Vanji, a jedan pogresan zakljucak navesce je da napadne jadnog Nebojsu. Arsa nije siguran da li mu prica oko Sofije i Kize smeta. Oseca kolicinu ljubomore, ali istovremeno i veliku naklonost ka Ani. Zbog svega sto ga je snaslo, Rade ce se veoma rastuziti, a razlog svog bola podelice sa Jocom.

106.title: Episode #1.106
106.plot: Taman kada Marina zavrsi u Nikolinom zagrljaju, na Vanjinim vratima se zaculo zvono. Potpuno izbezumljena, Marina na vratima zatice nepozvanog gosta. Stvari se dodatno usloznjuju kada se zvono zacuje opet. Kada ugleda Sofiju sa Kizom, Arsa dozivljava novo pomracenje svesti.

107.title: Episode #1.107
107.plot: Pavle dobija dojavu od Stefana da ce Marina ponovo pokusati da se sastane sa Nikolom, i to u Slobinom stanu. Zbog toga on ne casi ni casa i odlazi pravo na Slobina vrata. Kada upadne u stan kod Vanje optuzujuci je za laganje, Filipova bivsa upoznaje Radeta i tu se radaju obostrane simpatije. Lukava Tanja angazuje Taru da prati svaki Radetov korak, ali ono sto ce saznati, nece joj se svideti.

108.title: Episode #1.108
108.plot: Rade objasnjava Tatjani da mora na neodlozni sastanak sa poslovnim ortakom, ali ona ne veruje u njegovu pricu. Marina saopstava Pavlu svoju konacnu odluku. Kako bi spasio brak, on izvlaci keca iz rukava. Arsa priznaje Ani sta oseca prema njoj.

109.title: Episode #1.109
109.plot: Rade je nespretan u svojim lazima. Iako je trazio od Stefana i Joce da ga pokrivaju, on sam jedva uspeva da se sastavi u svojim izmisljotinama pa Tanja vrlo lako zakljucuje da je Rade vara. Zato odlucuje da ga raskrinka pa zove Pavla da joj pomogne, ali on je obuzet svojom brigom.

110.title: Episode #1.110
110.plot: Kada je izasao sa Zorom na veceru, Rade ne uspeva da precuti cinjenicu da je ozenjen, ali svojom iskrenoscu, umesto odbijanja dobija jos vecu naklonost simpaticne zene. Kada konacno odu u Stefanov stan kako bi nastavili romanticno druzenje, na vratima se pojavljuje histericna Tanja.

111.title: Episode #1.111
111.plot: Kada shvati da je Tanja ozbiljna u svojim namerama i da ce mu prilikom razvoda uzeti sve, pa i dete, Rade ponovo trazi pomoc od Stefana, koji mu preporucuje posebnog zastupnika. Ali stvari su daleko slozenije. Nakon sto ugleda Sofiju u Arsinoj majici, Ana razocarana izlece iz kuce i odlucuje da se sa majkom preseli u Novi Sad.

112.title: Episode #1.112
112.plot: Rade nema nameru da se odrekne Zore i cini sve da joj stavi do znanja da stvari nisu onakve kako izgledaju. U to ime, on odlucuje da je iznenadi. Arsa pokusava da objasni Ani da je po sredi veliki nesporazum i da on nema nista sa Sofijom. Taman kad pomisli da je svima dolijala, Tanja upada u sopstvenu zamku. Ceca ce biti potresena onim sto vidi.

113.title: Episode #1.113
113.plot: Rade uziva u razgovoru sa Zorom, a njeno prisustvo ga cini beskrajno zadovoljnim. Pre nego sto krenu iz stana, na vratima se pojavljuje neko koga je Rade najmanje ocekivao. Kada pocne da slaze kockice, Rade biva potresen.

114.title: Episode #1.114
114.plot: Tanja beskrupulozno iskoriscava Sofiju kako bi je pretvorila u svog saveznika. Na vratima Isidorovica se pojavljuje Rade, resen da sa Ilijom izgladi odnose. Ali, to nije jedina iznenadna poseta. U Radetovu poslovnicu dolazi Marina iz koje krece da kulja bes kada u fotelji svog oca zatekne Tatjanu. Kada vidi da ce ih Tanja sve zedne prevesti preko vode, Arsa krece u protivnapad.

115.title: Episode #1.115
115.plot: Plan koji je Arsa skovao sa svojim drugarima prolazi neocekivano dobro. Oni su uspeli da zabeleze trenutak kada Tatjana gubi zivce i beskrupulozno preti unuku svog supruga. Tanja je promenila plocu i ponovo vrti Radeta oko malog prsta. Na sastanku, on saopstava da od sada ni jedna odluka koja se tice njegovog preduzeca nece moci da bude donesena bez Tanjinog glasa. Da li ce Vanja prihvatiti Slobinu ponudu?

116.title: Episode #1.116
116.plot: Marina i Vanja su zelele da se malo opuste, ali casicu po casicu, stigle su do tacke bez povratka. Najvise je zaradio Sloba, ali ono sto je Nikola cuo od Marine, ostavilo je u senci sve prethodne dogadjaje. Taman kada se Ana uselila kod Arse, na vratima se pojavljuje Sofija i sopstava Arseniju da ceka njegovo dete.

117.title: Episode #1.117
117.plot: Tara odlazi kod Kristine i trazi joj savet u vezi sa Stefanom, a on dozivljava napad besa kada cuje sta se dogodilo. Vanja odlazi kod Marine i saopstava joj da ce postati baba, ali Nikola je najrazumniji u prici i naslucuje da je po sredi Sofijina velika prevara. Kada shvati da je Rade angazovao Daru, Tatjana potpuno odlepljuje.

118.title: Episode #1.118
118.plot: Kad je Goga dobila podatak da joj je cerka trudna, u trenutku dolazi iz Nisa za Beograd. Pod pritiskom, Sofija priznaje da je izmislila pricu o bebi, ali umesto prekora, od majke biva uvucena u novu besmislicu - sada mora da se uda za Arsu. Zanesena i izbezumljena majka ne odustaje od svoje zamisli, a kako bi bila sigurna da ce ostvariti ono sto je naumila, on se upucuje u poslovnicu kod Tatjane.

119.title: Episode #1.119
119.plot: Stefan iznosi Pavlu svoju sumnju da je Tatjana umesana u pricu o Sofijinoj trudnoci. Beskrupuloznim nastupom, Goga pritiska Tanju da ubedi Radeta da Arsa ozeni njenu cerku. Kada je cula Arsinu odluku, Marina se potresla. Vanja i Sloba prezivljavaju novi krah, a spasava ih recna policija.

120.title: Episode #1.120
120.plot: Sve vise ljudi sumnja da je Tatjana upletena u pricu o Sofijinoj trudnoci, a Pavle, svestan da ona svojom bolesnom igrom zeli da se osveti Arsi, veoma jasno upozorava svoju dragu: Ne diraj mi Arsu. Kada kod Slobe u stanu zatekne Gogu, Vanja za nju smislja nedvosmislenu poruku: Pali odavde. Sofija odlucuje da progovori i nastaje rasulo.

121.title: Episode #1.121
121.plot: Goga dolazi kod Tanje i trazi od nje da joj nadoknadi "svu stetu" zbog neprilike koju je napravila oko Sofijine lazne trudnoce. Pavlu je urnebesna cinjenica da je Rade posumnjao da je Nikola Arsin otac. Kako bi razresio svoju sumnju, Rade odlazi u kafic sa Ilijom i moli ga da mu razjasni u kakvom su odnosu Nikola i Arsa - Ono sto je cuo, veoma ga je uzbudilo.

122.title: Episode #1.122
122.plot: Radeta i dalje muci stvar koju mu je otkrio Ilija, ali ne razgovara ni s' kim o tome. Nakon razgovora sa Stefanom, Pavle se vraca kuci, ali besna Marina odatle odlazi kod Nikola pa Pavle zapocinje potragu sa njom prvo besno odlazeci kod Vanje. Nesa i Filip su se verili.

123.title: Episode #1.123
123.plot: Dana postaje svedok Tanjinog sloma. Njene halucinacije potpuno je zgranjuju. Kada shvati da je Arsina devojka zapravo cerka njegove velike simpatije Zore, Rade biva prijatno iznenadjen. Prisluskujuci razgovor izmedju Arse i Marine, Pavle shvata da je Marina kod Isidorovica i nastaje haos.

124.title: Episode #1.124
124.plot: Kad shvati da ga Nikola "vozi", Pavle potpuno gubi razum i saopstava Stefanu da ce da ga ubije. Dok Ceca prenosi abrove preko telefona, Arsa shvata da i ona zna za vezu izmedju Pavla i Tatjane pa koristi priliku da je natera da pred svima ponovi sta je rekla.

125.title: Episode #1.125
125.plot: Pavle pritiska Marinu da mu prizna da li je u vezi sa Isidorovicem. Umesto toga, ona mu saopstava da gaji osecanja prema Nikoli, sto potpuno unistava Pavlovu sujetu. U suzama, Rade se poverava Joci da ne zeli da se vrati kuci. Sve je spremno za proslavu Ilijine i Danine godisnjice braka, a porodicnu idilu prekida telefonski poziv. Krenuvsi kod Isidorovica, Pavle dozivljava tesku saobracajku.

126.title: Episode #1.126
126.plot: U bolnici, Stefan dozivljava zivcani slom zbog Pavlovog stanja i urla na Marinu koja je potpuno slomljena. I Nikolu muci osecaj krivice, a Tatjana poseze za starim porokom.

127.title: Episode #1.127
127.plot: Dok se Tatjana pomela zbog Pavlovog gubitka pamcenja, Arsa uvidja koliko je ozbiljan i slozen odnos izmedju njih dvoje. Zbog toga kako se Nikola oseca povodom novonastalog stanja, Arsa se ljutiti na svog rodjenog oca. Tanjina prividjanja postaju sve gora.

128.title: Episode #1.128
128.plot: Tara dobija hladan tus od Stefana. Ocajna zbog svih uvreda koje joj je izgovorio, ona pada u narucje Ziki. Tanja ne moze da se pomiri sa cinjenicom da je se Pavle ne seca pa zato ulazi u njegovu sobu i pocinje da ga ljudi. To biva dovoljno da mu se pamcenje vrati, ali.

129.title: Episode #1.129
129.plot: Taman sto je odlucila da pricu sa Stefanom ostavi za sobom, Tara izlazi na veceru sa Zikom ni ne sluteci da ce upasti u ljubavni trougao sa njegovom bivsom suprugom. Pavlu se secanje vratilo pa je sa bratom Stefanom sabrao sta mu se sve desilo pre saobracajne nesrece. Dok su njih dvojica razgovarali u kupatilu, nisu ni znali da ih Arsenije sve vreme presluskuje i da shvata da se Pavle sve vreme pretvarao. Da li ce se Pavle opet izvuci?

130.title: Episode #1.130
130.plot: Posle dogadjaja u restoranu kada je njegova zena imala napad ljubomore, Zika dolazi kod Tare kako bi joj saopstio svoju odluku. Rade dobija podatak da je Tanja otisla na ultrazvuk bez njega i krece joj u susret. Stanje sa Nebojsinim okolisanjem ocu se sve vise usloznjava.

131.title: Episode #1.131
131.plot: Nebojsa nikako ne uspeva da izgovori ocu da je peder zbog cega ga Ana stalno podbada. Filip je potpuno potresen. Prolazeci hodnikom, Tara cuje da je otac Tanjinog deteta Pavle sto je potpuno poremeticuje. Pavle slucajno nacuje nesto bitno: Rade sumnja da je dete njegovo.

132.title: Episode #1.132
132.plot: Kada vidi da je Tara u ocajnom stanju, Nikola je primorava da mu prizna sta se desava. Ona popusta pod pritiskom i saopstava mu da je Tatjana u vezi sa Pavlom i moli ga da nikom ne govori, ali on ne moze nista da joj obeca. Umesto toga, sledeceg jutra se na vratima Isidorovica se pojavljuje Tatjana noseci macetu i spremna da zapocne krvavi pir.

133.title: Episode #1.133
133.plot: Kada sazna za njegovu prljavu preljubu, Nikola odlazi kod Pavla i saopstava mu da zna da je dete koje Tanja nosi njegovo. Pavle se izbezumljuje i javlja Tatjani losu vest. Svestan da stvari konacno moraju da izadju na videlo, Nikola odlazi kod Marine, ali njihov razgovor prekida zmija otrovnica.

134.title: Episode #1.134
134.plot: Taman se Dana oporavila od kosmara, na vratima Isidorovica se ponovo pojavila Tanja, ali ovog puta na javi. Ona od Tare pokusava da sazna da li je ona rekla Nikoli za nju i Pavla, a odgovor je ne zadovoljava. U Vanjin stan iznenada dolazi Nebojsin otac, ali i Sloba i Kristina. Zbog Slobinih ispada, on odlazi kod Nebojse u stan i tamo shvata da je Nebojsa homoseksualac.

135.title: Episode #1.135
135.plot: Arsa iznosi Marini svoje sumnje da je otac Cecinog deteta zapravo Vaske. Dok su razmenjivali neznosti u kaficu, Nikoli i Marini je pobegla Eva. Tanja nastavlja da huska Radeta protiv Nikole, samo ovog puta ukljucuje i Iliju.

136.title: Episode #1.136
136.plot: Arsa trazi od Marine da se udalji i od Pavla i od Nikole. Njoj to tesko pada, a odluku joj olaksava upravo Nikola. Rade sapostava Tatjani nesto sto joj se uopste ne svidja.

137.title: Episode #1.137
137.plot: Rade saziva hitan porodicni sastanak na kom Pavle smislja da glumi pokornu zrtvu. To mu polazi za rukom sve dok Nikola ne izjavi da je doslo vreme da prizna Arsu i da mu da njegovo prezime. Ali, to nije sve. Nikola sada igra na sve ili nista.

138.title: Episode #1.138
138.plot: Polemika oko prezimena koje bi trebalo da stoji uz Arsino ime se nastavlja. Svako ima svoje objasnjenje o tome, ali ne i resenje. Ilija i Dana mole Taru da da otkaz u Radetovom preduzecu. Marini i Nikoli ne cvetaju ruze, a sve se dodatno usloznjuje kada odluce da prestanu da se vidjaju.

139.title: Episode #1.139
139.plot: Isidorovici itekako ulaze u rat sa Bozicima. Tesenje Nikole se zavrsava tako sto on zavrsava u krevetu sa Kristinom. U naletu strasti, Pave i Tatjana nisu ni svesni posledica koje ce pretrpeti zbog svojih spletki. Iako Taru roditelji mole da da otkaz u Bozicevom preduzecu, Tanja sa Stefanom priprema novu taktiku za nju. Da li ce ona nasesti?

140.title: Episode #1.140
140.plot: Dok Pavle i Tanja razmenjuju neznosti, u kuci se iznenada pojavljuje Rade i na podu zatice nesto sto je Pavlu ispalo. Izbezumljeni Pavle iskace kroz prozor, ali on i ne sluti da ga je video Joca. Tara se potpuno uzivela u ulogu velike direktorke. Dok je novom poslovnom oratku veoma simpaticna, Tanja nema previse razumevanja za njeno novo stanje.

141.title: Episode #1.141
141.plot: Rade pokusava da dokuci cije dugme je nasao na podu svoje kuce. U tome mu pomaze Joca. Nakon sastanka sa Nikolom, Pavla hvata nevidjena frka. On je siguran da ce Nikola pokazati svoj snimak ukoliko ne prizna preljubu sa Tatjanom. Tara zapocinje romansu sa novim poslovnim ortakom Bozicevog preduzeca.

142.title: Episode #1.142
142.plot: Pavlu istice vreme i on jako je zivcan. Tatjana pokazuje Radetu lazni list kojim se potvrdjuje da je on otac jos nerodjenog deteta. Na vrata Isidorovica stize Zika koji pokusava da ispravi stvari sa Tarom. Zbog grize savesti, Nikola odlazi kod Marine i priznaje joj sve sto zna o odnosu Pavla i Tanje. Marinu istina potresa.

143.title: Episode #1.143
143.plot: Pavle je sateran u cosak. Kad je video da je u bezizlaznom stanju, on je odlucio da se obracuna sa Nikolom, a taj susret prolazi krvavo. Kada je dobila potvrdu od Joce, Marina je krenula kod Tanje kako bi se suocila sa njom.

144.title: Episode #1.144
144.plot: Marina dolazi kod Nikole i zajednickim snagama pokusavaju da shvate kako je Pavle saznao za njihov razgovor. Na Kristini poziv Vanja dolazi kod Slobe kako bi mu pomogla da prevazice osecajnu krizu zbog Danilovog penzionisanja. Dok priprema izvestaj za Radeta, u preduzece ulazi Luka. Kada mu Tara objasni da povuce rucnu, on gubi razum i pocinje da nasrce na nju. Srecom, stize Zika.

145.title: Episode #1.145
145.plot: Kada je cuo od Marine da je videla nalaze DNK analize i da je sigurna da je dete Radetovo, Pavle dozivljava ogroman potres. Zbog Danilovog odlaska, Sloba ne moze da dodje k' sebi pa trazi novog "kucepazitelja", a prvi izbor mu je Vaske. Sloba se toliko uplasio da ostane sam, da je sa rancem punim igrica otisao kod Vanje.

146.title: Episode #1.146
146.plot: Poveravajuci se Joci da je ispala smesna u Radetovim ocima jer je analiza pokazala da je Tanjino dete 100% Radetovo, Marina dobija samar i shvata da je jos jednom nasamarena. Analiza ne da mira ni Pavlu, pa ona moli Stefana da mu pomogne da je provere. I Tara ima priznanje, zaljubljena je u Ziku, a on ne gubi vreme. Marina zatice Tanju u stanju zivcanog rastrojstva, a to se ne zavrsava dobro.

147.title: Episode #1.147
147.plot: Posle traumaticnog susreta sa Tanjom, Marina odlazi kod Joce i uplaseno mu saopstava da je Tanja luda i da nije osoba za koju se predstavlja da jeste. Stefan odlucuje da laze Pavla i saostava mu da je dete zaista Radetovo. Kada joj Tanja dodje u kucu, Marina odlucuje da zaigra na kartu Anastasije Bencic.

148.title: Episode #1.148
148.plot: Kad je kurir pogresio i zamenio poklone koje je Pavle namenio Tanji i Marini, kod njega u poslovnicu dolazi pobesneli Arsa koji mu stavlja do znanja da je shvatio kome je koji poklon bio namenjen. Nikola saopstava roditeljima da zeli da se odseli i zapocne samostalni zivot. Kad je konacno shvatila slicnost i vezu izmedju Anastasije i Tanje, Marina odlazi da se obracuna.

149.title: Episode #1.149
149.plot: Posle jos jednog bezuspesnog pokusaja da raskrinka Tanju, Marina svoje objasnjenje saopstava Arsi. Nedugo zatim, na njen kucni prag stize nepotpisano pismo cija je sadrzina zaprepascuje.

150.title: Episode #1.150
150.plot: Tanja poziva Marinu i Vanju na veceru kako bi im saopstila nesto vazno. U medjuvremenu stize novo nepotpisano pismo, ali ovoga puta Marina i Vanja hvataju kurira. Kako bi konacno isterale stvari na cistac, njih dve zovu Stefana i zahtevaju od njega da im prizna sve sto zna o Tanji.

151.title: Episode #1.151
151.plot: Nikoli stize izvestaj od stedionice, a cifra koju je video na ekranu ga potpuno frapira. Kristina u trenutku pocinje da se ponasa drugacije prema njemu, optuzujuci ga da je izdao svoja uverenja. Kada joj se pozalio da mu je tesko zbog Isidorovicevog dolaska u preduzece, Tanja obecava Pavlu da ce se osvetiti. Ona smislja pricu o izgubljenoj rodjaki i nada se da ce Marina i Vanja nasesti.

152.title: Episode #1.152
152.plot: Kada je Kristina iznenada dosla kod Nikole, ona u stanu zatice Marinu, a jedana njena nepromisljena opaska je bila povod za veliko udaljavanje. Tanja nastavlja svoju prljavu igru pa poziva Vanju telefonom i predstavlja se kao Anastasija, Ali tokom njihovog razgovora, u poslovnicu ulece Pavle.

153.title: Episode #1.153
153.plot: Stefan kuje podli plan - ponovo ce da smuva Taru kako bi upravljao svime sto se desava oko Nikole. Marina nije ni ne slutila sta se sprema. Dok je ocekivala Anastasiju usplahirena sto nema Vanje, na vratima se pojavljuje Tanja i unosi dah smrti.

154.title: Episode #1.154
154.plot: Kad je poslusala Nikolin savet kako da konacno otkrije pravi lik Tatjane Bozic, Marina se nalazi oci u oci sa svojom drugaricom iz srednje skole i vise nema vrdanja. Izmedju Nikole i Pavla izbija novi kurslus, a posledice se nikome ne dopadaju, a ponajmanje Radetu. Videvsi Taru u Stefanovom zagrljaju, Zika nedvosmisleno odlucuje da otkaze vencanje.

155.title: Episode #1.155
155.plot: Pod izgovorom da ima temperaturu, Vaske zove Vanju da dodje i pomogne Slobi. Umesto temperature, Vanju docekuje veliko iznenadjenje: romanticna vecera i molba da pocnu ispocetka. Romasu prekida Danilov povratak i ostaje neizvesno da li ce sve drugo pasti u vodu? Posle svega sto se desilo, Tanja odlucuje da napusti zemlju. Izbezumljeni Rade dolazi kod Marine i zahteva da mu kaze istinu.

156.title: Episode #1.156
156.plot: Tara je ocajna zbog svega sto joj se dogodilo. Kad je Nikola saznao da je u njenu nesrecu umesan Stefan, on odlucuje da se obracuna sa njim, ali sa Stefanom je i razjareni Pavle. Ocajna Tanja je u velikoj krizi - potpuno izbacena iz stroja pa zove Vanju i moli je za pomoc.

157.title: Episode #1.157
157.plot: Nikola na nagovor ekipe odlucuje da napravi zurku useljenja. Vanja u tome vidi priliku da celoj ekipi predstavi novu Anastasiju, tacnije Tanju, ali Tanja ima druge planove. Kada je Stefan preko Tare poceo da preti Nikoli, Tara je odlucila da ga nabode u glavu.

158.title: Episode #1.158
158.plot: Stefana je sramota sto je popio udarac od Tare pred celim preduzecem pa se zali Pavlu koji odlucuje da se osveti. On nepozvan odlazi na Nikolinu zurku useljenja gde svima kvari zabavu, ali najvise Tanji koja odlucuje da istupi sa svojim velikim priznanjem.

159.title: Episode #1.159
159.plot: Arsa laze Anu da ide da se vidi sa Nikolom pa mu susret sa Sofijom zagorcava zivot. Marina u Slobinom stanu dozivljava potres kada ugleda negliziranu Kristinu, ali jos veci potres dozivljava Nikola kada u Marininom kupatilu zatekne Pavla u bademantilu.

160.title: Episode #1.160
160.plot: Izmedju Tatjane i Stefana izbija rat nakon snimka koji je Zika po nagovoru ubacio u Tanjin racunar. Marina konacno saopstava Nikoli da je podnela zahtev za razvod braka.

161.title: Episode #1.161
161.plot: Pavle je uveren da Marina zeli da mu se vrati pa setka okolo k'o muva bez glave. Rade odlazi kod Marine kako bi saznao kakva je veza izmedju Tatjane i Anastasije Bencic, ali se na vratima pojavljuje Tanja koja navaljuje da ona saopsti Radetu istinu. Kad je od Nikole saznao da je Marina podnela hartije za razvod braka, Arsa je poludeo.

162.title: Episode #1.162
162.plot: Kad je cuo za Marinin plan za medijaciju, Pavle je potpuno poludeo, a ona biva potresena njegovim reagovanjem. Dok je pokusavala da mu stavi do znanja da ga vise ne voli, Pavle ju je je poljubio, a tom cinu svedocili su unezvereni Nikola i Arsa. Zatecena u bezizlaznom stanju, Tanja odlucuje da prizna Radetu da je ona zapravo Anastasija Bencic.

163.title: Episode #1.163
163.plot: Kad je iz Tanjinih usta cuo da ona zapravo voli Radeta, Pavlu se rusi svet. On ostavlja oprostajno pismo i penje se na vrh zgrade. Svi dolaze za njim i mole ga da sidje sa ivice, ali on ih ne cuje.

164.title: Episode #1.164
164.plot: Kako bi se ponovo uvukao u Marininu kucu, Pavle vesto glumi ucveljenost i svi padaju na njegove fore o samoubistvu. Prvi pocinje da sumnja Nikola, ali kad je cuo da se posle svega Pavle vratio kuci, on potpuno biva slomljen. Vanja razmislja da Slobi pruzi jos jednu priliku.

165.title: Episode #1.165
165.plot: Pod Kristininim uticajem, ali i zbog Pavlovog povratka, Nikola odlucuje da stavi tacku na vezu sa Marinom. Ona je potpuno potresena i ne zna kako da reaguje.

166.title: Episode #1.166
166.plot: Posle Nikolinog raskida, ocajna Marina se obraca Vanji za pomoc. Kao dva sakala koji vrebaju, Kristina je presrecna sto ce moci ponovo da pokusa sa Nikolom dok Pavle slusa Stefanov savet i odlazi da tesi Marinu.

167.title: Episode #1.167
167.plot: Iako Marina dolazi Nikoli na noge i saopstava mu da ga voli, on ne posustaje u svojoj nameri i ne zeli da se pomiri sa njom. Ocajna, Marina odlazi iz stana Isidorovica. Sloba biva prijatno iznenadjen Vanjinim dolaskom, ali i njenom odlukom.

168.title: Episode #1.168
168.plot: Pavle pokusava da sazna od Marine sta se desilo sa njom i Isidorovicem. Kako nailazi na otpor, on joj saopstava da zeli da se preseli u Nebojsin stan. Stefan ubacuje Tari bubicu kako bi zajedno mogli da provedu njeno devojacko vece. Prizor koju je videla potpuno porazava Marinu, ali ona nije jedina povredjena ovim gestom.

169.title: Episode #1.169
169.plot: Ziku neprijatno iznenadjuje kada cuje da Tara priprema devojacko vece. Na nagovor Nikole i Slobe, i on pocinje da razmislja o momackoj veceri. Stanje pred vencanje dodatno usloznjuje Marinina odluka da se ne pojavi na svadbi sto Nikoli posebno tesko pada.

170.title: Episode #1.170
170.plot: Dok se Zika silom prilika zabavlja sa striptizetom na momackoj veceri, Taru muci velika poteskoca. Kad je priznala majci u cemu je stvar, Dana biva potresena. Kristina otvoreno razgovara sa Marinom, a ona joj biva veoma zahvalna.

171.title: Episode #1.171
171.plot: Svadbeno veselje Tare i Zike pocinje divnim iznenadjenjem zbog cega mlada umalo pada u nesvest. Ali onaj koji zaista zavrsava bez svesti je Rade koji konacno saznaje istinu o Tatjani, Pavlu i njihovom detetu. S' obzirom da nije u mogucnosti da se sam izbori sa poteskocama, on moli Arsu da preuzme porodicni posao, a on ulogu gazde shvata veoma ozbiljno i spreman je na drasticne mere. Kada je saznao da je Tanja ustvari Anastasija Bencic, Pavle ne moze da se obuzda, a reci koje joj izgovara, dovode je na ivicu zgrade. Da li ima povratka?

imdb.plot outline: Through many diffrent situations, we follow the life of a family, friends, love (revered and unclaimed), and through the episodes new characters (guest stars) appear, which additionally complement the most diffrent life situations of our main characters. The evening graduation party brings together Pavle and Marina, the most popular teenagers in the school, with Nikola, Kristina and Sloba, the most famous outsiders of the school. That night, filled with excitement, loud music and alcohol will keep everyone in their memory as the end of one era and the beginning of a new stage in their lives. 18 years later, their lives are crossing again. Pavle and Marine have a son Arsenije, who is a teenager, and Nikola,Kristina and Sloba live as if nothing had changed in those 18 years - and still respected the oath which they laid down a long time ago that they would never have a permanent job, a serious bond and a family. After an accidental encounter between Nikola and Marina, the secrets from the past will flow to the surface that will change their lives to all.
